headline: Is Now the Right Time to Reconsider Lam After the 13% Weekly Price Surge?
summary: If you have been watching Lam Research lately, you are not alone. The stock has been on a tear this year, and plenty of investors are wondering if it still has room to run, or if now’s the time to take some gains off the table. Lam’s share price jumped 13.6% in the past week alone, part of a 61.5% climb since the beginning of the year. Looking further back, returns are even more impressive with the stock up 194.9% over three years and more than tripling (303.2%) over five years. That kind of...
